api-security.title: Securing REST API Communications
api-security.description: Protecting data transmitted between client and server
api-security.recommendedApproach: Use TLS 1.3 with ECDHE for key exchange and AES-GCM or ChaCha20-Poly1305 for encryption

database-encryption.title: Database Encryption at Rest
database-encryption.description: Encrypting sensitive data stored in databases
database-encryption.recommendedApproach: Use AES-256 for column-level encryption with secure key management

file-encryption.title: File and Document Encryption
file-encryption.description: Protecting files on disk or in cloud storage

iot-devices.title: IoT Device Communication
iot-devices.recommendedApproach: Use ChaCha20-Poly1305 for efficiency and ECC for key exchange

mobile-apps.title: Mobile Application Data Protection
mobile-apps.description: Encrypting sensitive data in mobile applications
mobile-apps.recommendedApproach: Use platform keystore with AES-GCM or ChaCha20

email-encryption.title: Email Encryption
email-encryption.recommendedApproach: Use RSA or ECC for key exchange with AES for message encryption

video-streaming.title: Video Streaming Protection
video-streaming.recommendedApproach: Use AES-CTR or ChaCha20 for low-latency streaming
